file.string: Welcome to QuickHold\nSet up your master password to get started
Set up your master password to get started
Unlock with your fingerprint or face
Password must be at least 8 characters
Too many attempts. Try again in %d seconds
Please use the same password you set on your first device
Please login with password first to enable biometrics
Password must be at least 8 characters
Too many failed attempts. Please wait %d seconds
Password does not match existing data from other devices. Please use the same password you set on your first device.
Waiting for iCloud sync... Please try again in a few moments.
Tap + to add your first card
Are you sure you want to delete this card?
Paste invoice or payment info to auto-fill the form
Paste invoice or payment information, the system will automatically recognize and fill in the fields
Select a photo of your document to automatically extract information
Upload front and back of your ID card. Information will be automatically extracted.
Upload the data page (photo page) of your passport.
Upload a photo of your business license.
Click to add or replace document photos
Watermark will be overlaid diagonally on the image
Leave empty for no limit. Image will be resized proportionally
Are you sure you want to delete this attachment?
⚠️ This will permanently delete all cards, images, and files. This action cannot be undone!
This will permanently delete all data and cannot be undone. Enter your password to confirm.
This will delete all your cards and settings. This action cannot be undone.
Tap + in the top right to create your first item
Store text information for quick sharing
Save images with watermark sharing support
Store various files with PDF preview support
Up to 10 files, each file no more than 10MB
Set a clear title for the item
Up to 10 images can be selected
Optional: Use tags to help with categorization and search
Watermark will be tiled diagonally across the image
Are you sure you want to delete this item?
Cross-platform photo transfer tool. Transfer photos quickly between Mac and iPhone without network.
Turn your iPhone into a secure mobile drive
All data is stored only on your device, never uploaded to any cloud server. Works completely offline.
Uses AES-256-GCM encryption algorithm. All sensitive data is encrypted before storage. Even if the device is lost, it cannot be cracked.
Images, PDFs, and other attachments are all encrypted. Supports adding watermarks when exporting photos.
No account registration required. No personal information needed. Your data belongs entirely to you.
Search by title, field values, or tags
No cards yet\nTap + to add your first card
Password must be at least 8 characters
• AES-256-GCM encryption\n• Local-first, no cloud sync\n• Open-source software
At least one field is required
Invalid phone format (11 digits starting with 1)
No app found to open this file
欢迎使用随取\n设置主密码以开始使用
设置主密码以开始使用
使用指纹或面部识别解锁
两次输入的密码不一致
尝试次数过多，请在 %d 秒后重试
检测到其他设备的数据
请使用您在第一台设备上设置的相同密码
检测到其他设备的数据
正在等待 iCloud 同步...
请先使用密码登录以启用生物识别
密码必须至少 8 个字符
失败次数过多，请等待 %d 秒
密码与其他设备的现有数据不匹配。请使用您在第一台设备上设置的相同密码。
正在等待 iCloud 同步...请稍后再试。
所有数据仅存储在您的设备上，不上传到任何云端服务器，完全离线使用。
采用 AES-256-GCM 加密算法，所有敏感数据都经过加密存储，即使设备丢失也无法被破解。
图片、PDF 等附件均加密保存，导出照片时支持添加水印。
无需注册账号，无需提供任何个人信息，您的数据完全属于您自己。
点击 + 添加您的第一张卡片
确定要删除这张卡片吗？
粘贴开票信息或收款信息，自动解析填写表单
请粘贴开票信息或收款信息，系统将自动识别并填写相应字段
上传证件正面（含头像与号码）
上传护照信息页（含照片页）
选择证件照片，自动提取信息填写表单

身份证背面（含签发机关与有效期）
上传身份证正反面照片，系统将自动识别并填写信息。
上传护照信息页（含照片的一页）。
点击添加或替换证件照片
水印将以半透明对角线方式覆盖在图片上
留空表示不限制。图片会等比例缩放以适应尺寸限制
确定要删除这个附件吗？
⚠️ 此操作将永久删除所有卡片、图片和文件，且无法恢复！
此操作将永久删除所有数据，且无法恢复。请输入密码以确认。
这将删除您的所有卡片和设置。此操作无法撤销。
点击右上角 + 创建第一张卡片
存储文本信息，便于快速分享

水印将以对角线平铺方式覆盖在图片上
跨平台照片传输工具，无需网络，Mac和iPhone之间快速传输照片。
iPhone做U盘，私密文件保险箱，安全加密存储您的隐私文件和照片。
支持搜索标题、字段值或标签
尝试使用不同的关键词
